attributes.action: Require all public buildings to display the Union Jack flag
attributes.additional_details: We think seeing the Union Jack flying proudly would inspire patriotism and remind us of the values and traditions that have shaped our nation. By visibly showcasing our flag, we think we could strengthen our national identity and ensure that future generations understand and appreciate the legacy of the United Kingdom. Therefore, we respectfully request the government to implement a policy that encourages the regular and respectful display of the Union Jack flag on public buildings.
attributes.background: We believe in celebrating and honouring the rich history and heritage of the United Kingdom. We think displaying the Union Jack on public buildings will serve as a daily reminder of our collective history, fostering a sense of pride and belonging among citizens of all backgrounds.
